response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business operations. Given its value and the impact it could have on your company, I am offering it to you for $11,500. This price reflects the high quality and unique features of the product while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. I am confident that this investment will pay off in terms of efficiency gains and cost savings for your organization. Please let me know if you require any further information or demonstrations to help you make an informed decision.", "product_price": 11500}
